| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |

| 1 |  | wrd2f1tovbij.d | |- D = { w e. Word V | ( ( # ` w ) = 2 /\ ( w ` 0 ) = P /\ { ( w ` 0 ) , ( w ` 1 ) } e. X ) } |
| 2 |  | wrd2f1tovbij.r | |- R = { n e. V | { P , n } e. X } |

| 5 | 4 | #P_a1i | |- ( P e. V -> F : D -1-1-> R ) |
